metadata.feature_description: View and manage all unpublished posts including drafts and posts under review

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Publisher module loads with unpublished posts panel
steps.actual: News page loaded successfully with Publisher module visible

steps.action: Click on Unpublished Posts toggle button
steps.expected: Unpublished panel displays list of unpublished posts
steps.actual: Unpublished panel displayed with table showing 3 posts: Name, Date created, Author, Actions columns

steps.action: Look for filter dropdown or status filter in Unpublished panel
steps.expected: Filter option to distinguish between drafts and posts under review
steps.actual: No filter dropdown or status filter UI element exists. Panel shows 'Unpublished' as single category without draft/review distinction

issues: No filter by status (draft/review) functionality available in the UI

steps.action: Click on 'Date created' column header to sort
steps.expected: Posts should be sorted by date in ascending/descending order
steps.actual: Clicking column header does not trigger any sorting. No sort indicators visible on column headers. Posts remain in same order.

issues: Column headers are not clickable for sorting
No sort indicators or interactive sorting available

steps.action: Look for checkboxes in table rows for bulk selection
steps.expected: Checkboxes should allow selecting multiple posts for bulk actions
steps.actual: No checkboxes exist in the table rows. Bulk selection is not available.

issues: No bulk selection functionality available - checkboxes not present in UI

steps.action: Hover over an unpublished post row
steps.expected: Action buttons should appear in the Actions column
steps.actual: View (eye icon) and Edit (pencil icon) buttons appeared on hover

steps.expected: Post editor should open for editing
steps.actual: Post editor opened with Title, Description, URL fields, Featured checkbox, Tags, and Publish/Reject/Discard/Save buttons

steps.action: Open post editor from unpublished list
steps.actual: Post editor has 'Discard' button that can be used to delete/discard draft posts. No direct delete button in unpublished list but Discard button in editor achieves same result.

issues: Delete action requires opening the post editor first rather than being available directly in the list

steps.action: View unpublished posts list for workflow state information
steps.expected: Workflow state (draft, pending review, etc.) should be visible
steps.actual: Unpublished list only shows: Name, Date created, Author, Actions. No workflow state column or details visible.

issues: Workflow state details not displayed in unpublished posts list

steps.action: Look for export button or menu option in Unpublished panel
steps.expected: Export option to download list as CSV, Excel, or other format
steps.actual: No export functionality visible in the UI. Panel only has Close button in header.

issues: Export functionality not available in the UI

observations: Code review (UnpublishedPosts.ascx) confirms UI is a simple table without filter/sort/bulk selection features
UnpublishedPostDto.cs shows basic fields: PostId, ContentItemId, AuthorUserId, Title, CreatedOnDate - no status field
The Unpublished panel is accessed via a toggle button at bottom of Publisher module page
View and Edit actions appear on row hover - not visible by default
The post editor provides Publish, Reject, Discard, and Save workflow actions
